p: [5.] As reference ET data, we use here the recently compiled LandFlux-EVAL synthesis product based on all data set categories and computed for the years 1989–1995 [see Mueller et al., 2013]. A total of 40 observation-based data sets, land-surface model output, and atmospheric reanalyses are included in this synthesis product. The statistics used are the median and interquartile range from the long-term mean or monthly values. Note that the median of most included data sets agreed well with observational estimates of precipitation minus runoff for large river basins [ Mueller et al., 2011].
